mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b. NAME category_name, c.item_desc FROM item a LEFT JOIN item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id LEFT JOIN item_desc c ON a.id = c.item_id WHERE a.status = 1
